Description: Gene that the resource is related to
Mouse ID if derived from a mouse line
Classification of reporter system utilized, if relevant (e.g. luciferase)
Identifier of protein family targeted by modification
UniProt ID of protein being targeted by modification, whether knockout, knockdown, or conversion to reporter status
Key sequence for CRISPR/RNAi - gRNA, siRNA, etc.
Applied modifying vector ID (for presto, yeast modifications, etc.)
Type of genetic modification - CRISPR, reporter, RNAi
Catalog ID of vendor if cells were purchased
Name of commercial vendor cells were obtained from, if purchased
If cell is disease associated, formal, canonical id from Disease Ontology
If cell is disease associated, formal, canonical name
List of gene(s) knocked out in the line, if any
RRID of cell line
Cellosaurus identifier of cell line
Cell line ontology (CLO) identifier of cell line utilized
Tissue (NCIT canonical name) from which cells were derived
Ontology Class: Tissue;Tissues Cell types and enzyme sources;Tissue

Description: Organism from which cells are derived (genus and species)
If iPS or differentiated cells, list identifier of original line from which they were derived
Cell type - primary, iPS, ES, differentiated, xenograft, etc.
Canonical name of cell line
External link to published data relevant for the current Pharos page
Physical repository from which resource can be purchased
External link to physical and/or digital repositories containing key metadata and ordering information for the resource
